Can Indian Economy expect revival despite rising inflation? What do you think are the major steps that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country?

        India is facing many uncertainities in the recent months out of which Inflation is one of the major problem. The governtment has to take necessary steps to overcome this problem. Inflation is high in India may be because imports are exceeding exports in our country. The government has to encourge the Industries in India to produce more high quality products and services and export to the outside countrys which can contribute much to the Indian Economy.

        one of the major reason for production being less in India is, the producers are unable to invest that is required for the production. So, the government should encourage such producers by providing them financial strength. And the producers also do not have advanced technology in the production process. This is because they do not have sufficient funds to invest on the technology.

         The political system has to be changed in our country. Because of some politicians the people who are really interested in putting up an industry are unable to come out. And the one who are carrying out business are focusing on their own benefits only. They are not contributing to the growth of the economy. Natural Calamities are also one of the reasons for production being less in India. Agriculture sector is majorly effected by the uncertain natural calamities. The government after such calamities should encourage the farmers to produce by providing subsidies to them. But what is happening in India is, the government is not providing any help after such natural calamities and though if government provide financial help to the farmers, before reaching it to them the officers or some politicians are exploiting such funds and finally nothing is getting to those who are in need.             

         So, I conclude that the government has to encourage the producers to contribute to the growth of the economy by producing high quality goods and to have high exports by providing them the proper finanacial support. Quality is most important because the customers are well educated these days and they are very much concerned about the quality of the goods.
